content.raw: The neck_ry offset file changes were introduced Tue 25, just a few days after after the first AtlasSimInterface3.0.0 was shipped.  John Hsu was focusing on resolving discrepancies between collision and visuals.  My best guess is that change was necessary to align the multisense with those visuals, but more accurate visuals were then delivered, and that offset was never removed.
